job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Role can be performed remotely , candidate needs to work US EST hours. Working with state of the art technologies as part of AI/ ML platform's team enabling scientists in Drug discovery R&D, Safety, Supply chain, Digital Health. Key requirements: •BS/MS in Computer Science or Computer Engineering •6+ years of experience designing & writing production-quality code •Good Knowledge of NVIDIA SDKs and HPC parallel systems •Excellent C/C++, CUDA and Python programming and software design skills, including debugging, performance analysis, and test •Knowledge of AWS/ Azure/ GCP cloud ecosystems to work closely on integration efforts with DevOps engineers •Exceptional attention to detail, close engagement in product design, and a constant focus on user experience •Strong interpersonal skills are required along with the ability to work in a agile & dynamic product-oriented teams on challenging projects •Good verbal and written communication skills in English Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd: •Experience working with NVIDIA/ Xilinx or custom ASIC SDKs 2+ yrs of experience optimising AI/ ML applications
